definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: I am alone and the road is very dark.
sentences.chinese: 我踽踽獨行，前路一片漆黑。

sentences.english: In the struggle to heal this nation and repair this world, we cannot walk alone.
sentences.chinese: 在完善改良我們國家的道路上，我們不能踽踽獨行。

sentences.english: Romance is a snowy evening you walk back home alone with creaking footsteps.
sentences.chinese: 浪漫是飛雪的黃昏踏雪而歸踽踽獨行。

sentences.english: But I am helpless, traveled alone, and only dream is my only companion.
sentences.chinese: 可我無依無靠，踽踽獨行，只有夢是我唯一的伴侶。

sentences.english: In the struggle for peace and justice, we cannot walk alone.
sentences.chinese: 在尋求和平與真理的道路上，我們不能踽踽獨行。

sentences.english: This is their world back traveled alone, you do not really feel bad I thought.
sentences.chinese: 背這自己的世界踽踽獨行，你都沒想過真的心疼我。

sentences.english: If you've ever seen a one-legged dog then you've seen me.
sentences.chinese: 你可曾見過一條在街上踽踽獨行的瘸狗麼？

sentences.english: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
sentences.chinese: 與友相伴，暗夜而行，勝過日光之下踽踽獨行。

definition: to be buried in a horse hide (idiom)/to give one's life on the battlefield
mountain and river exhausted (idiom); at the end of the line/nowhere to go
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
lit. a dream of Nanke/fig. dreams of grandeur
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
see 呂洞賓|吕洞宾[Lu:3 Dong4 bin1]
to die (idiom)/to breathe one's last/to give up the ghost
